title: EDM - Fun Facts
text: EDM has had a strong influence on gaming and gambling.
For over two decades some of the most
popular video games have featured EDM.
You are sure to recognise these.
rhythm games like amplitude and rez
*Games like Guitar Hero and Rock Band
like Skrillex, Zedd and The Glitch Mob.
the fourth-highest selling game of all time,
had several radio stations in the game
featuring EDM stars as hosts and artists.
